Seed.Tag1: Preparationsilica gel chromatography of the dichloromethane extract of the freeze-dried pulp of the ripe fruit of garcinia mangostana has led to the isolation of garcinone d.

Relation.Pattern: silica gel chromatography of the dichloromethane extract of the freeze-dried pulp of the ripe fruit of garcinia mangostana has led to the isolation of garcinone d.
this study reports on the isolation of garcinone d from the dichloromethane extract of the pulp of the freeze-dried ripe fruit of garcinia mangostana.
